duties_responsibilities.duty: Hire personnel, maintain staff records, and document staffing changes.
Implement and conduct new hire orientations and onboarding procedures.
Develop solutions to enhance efficiencies and work in collaboration with the Administrative Team.
Implement and manage Safe Environment policies, personnel, and Safe Environment records.
Assist Executive Director and staff to resolve complex or out of policy operation problems.
Assist staff with Outlook needs such as forwarding emails, out of office messages, and assigning emails.
Prepare reports and communications to present at Monthly Directors meetings.
Manage payroll and staff files including title, hire date, employment records, and other staff-related documents.
Perform other duties as assigned by the Executive Director.
